import { useContext, useState } from "react" import CartContext from "../Context/CartContext" import ItemCount from "../Components/ItemCount" import trash from "../Assets/trash-fill.svg" function Cart() { const { addItem, removeItem, clear, cart } = useContext(CartContext) const [cantidad, setCantidad] = useState(0) function onAdd(numero) { setCantidad(numero); } console.log(cart) return (
{cart .map((libro) => )}
Articulo Precio Cantidad
{libro.nombre} {libro.valor}
Footer 6
) } export default Cart
